title: any good tips for csing?
body:
I tend to rarely get more than 70+ CS every 10 mins, unless the laner is scared of me and sits at turret, my average for first 10 mins is about 50, i know that its pretty low and i do stuff up alot when im csing, hitting it a few hp too early then the minions steal it , or i hit it too late.

any tips would be appreciated im silver 2 btw, and i need to improve because apparently you should have mastered csing by gold?

replies.body:
DOT, damage over time (like teemo or shyvana (w)). 
Empowered attack at last moment (or any damage dealing thing)
Play evasive to your opponent if you are not too confident in last hitting
Every champ has a timed attack animation before they attack, time it
Every ranged champ has a basic attack flight speed. Get a basic understanding of their range and how long it takes to hit a minion at max range

Hope this helps

How to cs: 
Last hit :)

Unfortunately, If you have an iq of 75 (like most bronze/silver players) you will be too slow to work out how to last hit.
Best of luck in your future attempts :-D

https://www.pinterest.com/pin/81487074483031690/ 
The guide I have used to double my average cs in the past month :3

who are you trying to cs with usually? I tend to have problems csing with ranged champs, unless im playing draven. probably best to practice csing in bot games with different champs without runes or masteries and try to time your attacks for a lost hit, try for a few games then try again with runes and masteries.
